title: (x) Hot Dog magazine headline font - Scene {Michael Albright}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110416230144im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hot_dog_headline_font_6386.jpg)

This is a scanned part of a headline in the magazine Hot Dog, and I haven't been able to identify the font used.

If anyone here is able to help, I'd be ever so grateful.

Cheers!

m.
author: kellerman

comments.content:
I believe that is Scene Black.

Cheers!

And I believe you are spot on!

Hugs and kisses!

m.
